LanguageData.MedTimes_StoneQuarry.label: Stone Quarry
LanguageData.MedTimes_StoneQuarry.description: A Stone Quarry equipped with various tools used for the mining of coal, as well as the production of various types of stone chunks.
LanguageData.SW_CoalGenerator.label: Steam Engine Dynamo
LanguageData.SW_CoalGenerator.description: A large dynamo powered by a steam engine that burns coal to produce power. Has a chance to combust when damaged.
